name: graphql-request-profiler
description: Easy to use GraphQL performance analysis utility for tracing resolver execution time
author: Regan Karlewicz <regan@econify.com>

scripts.dev:express: npx nodemon -i dist -e "js ts" -x "npm run build && npm run example:express"
scripts.dev:apollo: npx nodemon -i dist -e "js ts" -x "npm run build && npm run example:apollo"
